results.title: Advances in cheddar cheesemaking
results.brief_description: Designed primarily for the cheese industry. Firstly it shows the traditional method of cheesemaking and then it describes a mechanical process developed to reduce the time and labour required.

results.title: Advanced tumbling
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Tumbling”.
Designed to aid in the teaching of more difficult stunts, including low arm to arm balance, snap arm to arm balance, high arm to arm balance, backward handspring, round-off to backward handspring, side leg pitch, backward somersault, shoulder straddle into assisted forward somersault, and combinations.

results.title: Advanced science: the spectrograph
results.creator_credit: Morag MacLennan and World Wide Pictures
results.brief_description: Demonstrates the nature and principles of the spectrograph by natural photography and by animated diagram. Illustrates the use of the spectrograph in qualitative and quantitative detection of impurities; in biological research in criminology; and in astronomy.

results.title: Advanced science: isotopes
results.brief_description: This film describes the nature and production of isotopes; radio-active isotopes and their use in industry and medicine. Shows natural uranium being separated into isotopes; uses lithium as an example to explain the meaning of isotopes; history of their discovery; methods of separating isotopes, and the making of radio-isotopes and their uses are illustrated.
results.description: This film describes the nature and production of isotopes; radio-active isotopes and their use in industry and medicine. Shows natural uranium being separated into isotopes; uses lithium as an example to explain the meaning of isotopes; history of their discovery; methods of separating isotopes, and the making of radio-isotopes and their uses are illustrated.

results.title: Advanced passenger train: a selection of recent shots
results.brief_description: An insight into British Railways Advanced Passenger Train, showing the work being done in research and testing for this new generation of rail vehicle including the “E” and “POP” trains. The train will be powered by gas turbine engines and will have a host of revolutionary ideas such as hydro-kinetic braking, swinging arm suspension for curves.

results.title: Advanced passenger train
results.brief_description: Gives an insight into British Rail’s Experimental Advanced Passenger Train powered by gas turbines and with a host of revolutionary ideas such as a tilting system to stabilise the train at speed on sharp curves and hydro-kinetic braking.

results.title: Advanced editing
results.creator_credit: Lynn John, John A. Givins and KTV Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode number 13 of Series “Video tech”.
Focuses on advanced editing principles and the editing suite including the Beatcam editing suite, the S-VHS edit bench, how to assemble and insert edits, the mixing of sound including voice overs, graphics, sound effects and sound mixing.

results.title: Adults as learners. No. 2 (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Anthony Cash, Roger Owen and BBC-TV
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Teaching Adults”.
Demonstrates in a machine shop situation how blind workers are taught. A practising artist explains to a group of varying ages and educational background the fundamentals of abstract art.
